section_title: 22g28. Waiting period for bona fide sick pay plan.
text:
There
is no bright-line test for how many days and how short a waiting period are
required for a sick leave plan to be bona fide.  WHD has previously approved
leave plans that allow for at least 6 days of sick leave per year. With respect
to a qualifying period, the WHD previously deemed a leave plan that required
one year of service prior to payment of sick pay benefits to be bona fide. WHD
FLSA Non-Administrator Letter August 15, 1972WHD
Opinion Letter FLSA 2006-32
html:
There is no bright-line test for how many days and how short a waiting period are required for a sick leave plan to be bona fide.  WHD has previously approved leave plans that allow for at least 6 days of sick leave per year. With respect to a qualifying period, the WHD previously deemed a leave plan that required one year of service prior to payment of sick pay benefits to be bona fide.

WHD FLSA Non-Administrator Letter August 15, 1972
